name: Time Stripper Mako-chan
overview: Shinji Nakayama's in trouble. Trouble with his girlfriend, trouble with all his other women. He's always late for work. He's always skipping classes. He's got to book the entertainment for the weekend concert, and it's the most important decision of his life. It's not just his chance to win a bet with the snooty homecoming queen, it could be his last chance to hook up with the love of his life. Multi-format release for Win 3.1, Win 95, PC-9821 models and FM-Towns computers.
